name: Hacman: a Mining Challenge
description:
Defeat your opponent by programming your versatile mining vehicle and collect more gems!

Featuring:

- a smooth grapical programming interface

- socket-based online games

- procedurally generated maps to add up the challenge

- light-weight and cute pixel art

*This is the collaborative work of Alex Shen, Andy Peng, Mark Guevara, Johnny Wan, Regina Wang, and Soheil Vojdani Tabatabai for our CS 130 class project at UCLA, Spring 2021*
